newsitem.title: ESTONIA: Estonia Tallinna Pank 9 month profit 38 mln kroons.
newsitem.headline: Estonia Tallinna Pank 9 month profit 38 mln kroons.

text.p: Estonia's fourth largest bank, Tallinna Pank, on Monday reported a nine-month retained profit of 37.5 million kroons, versus retained earnings of 20.9 million kroons at the end of the first half of 1996.
It did not give comparisons for the 1996 and 1995 nine-month figures.
The bank said in a balance sheet statement that its assets grew 18.7 percent over the third quarter to 1.8 billion kroons at the end of September.
Income from securities rose to 175.8 million kroons by the end of September from 138.6 million at the end of June.
The net loan portfolio was 981.3 million kroons, compared with 762.1 million kroons at the end of the first half.
The bank said its share capital was stable at 96 million kroons.
Most of the top Estonian commercial banks, which are quoted on the Tallinn stock exchange, are expected to release nine-month reports this week.
Eesti Uhispank, also quoted in Helsinki, earlier reported profits for the first eight months of the year of 36.8 million kroons and forecast full-year earnings of 56 million kroons.
